title: (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2011 (No. 23 of 2011)) of the Courts of Justice
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the District Court (Fees) (Amendment)
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the District Court (Fees) (Amendment) 

(No. 2) Order 2021. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 22 October 2021.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited district court (fees) (amendment) (no 2) order 2021 (2) order come operation 22 october 2021

title: (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2011 (No. 23 of 2011)) of the Courts of Justice
heading: 2. The District Court (Fees) Order 2014 (S.I. No. 22 of 2014) (as amended
text_raw:
2. The District Court (Fees) Order 2014 (S.I. No. 22 of 2014) (as amended 
by Article 2 of the District Court (Fees) (Amendment) Order 2021 (S.I. No. 
444 of 2021)) is amended by the insertion of the following Article after Article 
4B: 

“4C. Notwithstanding Article 2, no fee shall be payable under this 
Order in respect of the item specified in column (1) of Part 4 of the 
Schedule, at reference number (7), where the application is for a 
Special Exemption Order that has effect at any time during the period 
beginning on 22 October 2021 and ending on 31 December 2021.”. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 26th October, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [534] 3 

The Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform consents to the making of the 
foregoing Order. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for Public 
Expenditure and Reform, 

20 October, 2021. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 

Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

20 October, 2021. 

HEATHER HUMPHREYS, 

Minister for Justice. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [534]
